data.comment: The match is underway in Sendai.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama FC in Sendai.
In the minute 2, Can Yokohama FC capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Yokohama FC are coming forward and Takuya Matsuura gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 3, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sendai a goal kick.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sendai, Yuji Senuma of Yokohama FC is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 6, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Yokohama FC throw-in in Sendai's half.
At Yurtec Stadium, Yokohama FC are penalized for being offside.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.

Yokohama FC have a goal kick.

Yokohama FC are pushing forward but Kohei Tezuka's finish is wide of the goal.
